TEXT.S: Iran hya' ga cyux maki' tay 32 00 N, 53 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,648,195 sq km (maki' tay 18ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,531,595 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 116,600 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 82,801,633. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 30.10 , lhlahuy hya' ga 6.80 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 63.10 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Tehran. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay spayat byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Hassan Rouhani, aring ryax 4 squ byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2013 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
